aka: HaMoadon LeSafrut Yaffa Shel Hagveret Yanlekova

cast.name: 阿尼娅·布克斯坦 Ania Bukstein

awards:
第42届蒙特利尔世界电影节(2018)
　　金天顶奖(提名)
this_title: המועדון לספרות יפה של הגברת ינקלובה
trans_title: HaMoadon LeSafrut Yaffa Shel Hagveret Yanlekova
introduction: What is going on behind the closed doors of the women-only secret club? The first rule is that love is prohibited. When Sophie falls in love with a mysterious man, she must choose between her last chance for true love to her loyalty to the club.
chinese_title: המועדון לספרות יפה של הגברת ינקלובה
